about_the_game:
The developer of In His Time was raised in the household of a Christian pastor in Japan, a country with a small Christian population. This lends a rare perspective to its storytelling. Look inside and you will find a story of forgiveness and hope.

"In His Time" is a 2D adventure game of puzzle solving.
There is no game over, and players can enjoy solving moderately difficult puzzles to reach the goal.
The appeal of "In His Time" lies in the cute character design reminiscent of shadow puppets and the high-quality music that plays in each scene.

Story[/u]
He has heard his whispers. Nobody is left out of God's plan.

Everything around him is driving Olly into a corner. School, friends, even Mom and Dad. Olly's days are filled with feelings of isolation and loneliness.
However, one day a ray of hope appeared for Olly in the form of the clockmaker Joseph.
His stories meant a great deal to Olly. He told him where his father is, what kind of place Heaven is.
Joseph's words enrapture Olly. They give him hope. Still, who really is Joseph?
This enigmatic figure has Olly under his thumb. Where will Olly’s path ultimately lead him?

short_description: This is a 2D adventure game of puzzle solving. As you control Ollie, a young boy, use your head to overcome the many obstacles that stand in your way. To obtain items, you may need to persuade characters or win mini-games. Through these, players will get to know the world even better.
